title: Lakshmi Kasu Haram - Divine Elegance in Every Bead
materials: meticulously handcrafted with radiant Diamonds and Ruby accents. Featuring lustrous cultured Pearls. Exhibits exquisite craftsmanship with a Hyderabadi polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Inspired by traditional Temple Jewellery, this exquisite Haaram showcases intricate Nakshi work featuring a central Lakshmi pendant. The delicate pendant is surrounded by carved floral motifs, adorned with Diamonds and accented with Ruby. Finished with a traditional pearl drop design.
colors: striking Red Rubies and Pearl White. Creates a rich and auspicious color palette synonymous with South Indian bridal traditions.
occasions: and other auspicious occasions. An ideal piece for the bride's trousseau or a Seemantham ceremony. Also suitable for adding a touch of traditional elegance to modern formal wear.
description: A timeless treasure, this Lakshmi Kasu Haram embodies divine grace and cultural heritage. The meticulously handcrafted design and use of premium materials ensure lasting beauty and heirloom quality. It's a statement piece that blends tradition with elegance, making it a cherished possession for generations.
